answers.answer: My first thought would be diabetes. Have you been tested?
I don't know what the numbers from your scale mean, but my first thought also was diabetes.  Or how much salt does your diet contain?

question: I wanted to know why I always feel thirsty.  I drink water but does not quench my thirst.  what could this be.  I also bought ascale that measures water comsumption in your body and my numbers were low.  My number was 44% and it should be 52-58% depending on body fat number which is 27
title: extereme thirst
